Summary Dr. Emrah Zarifoglu works as the Optimization Team Leader at IBM. He leads the Optimization Science team in developing and maintaining price optimization models, formulations and algorithms to help retailers make better merchandising decisions as a part of Retail Science team of DemandTec product suite under ExperienceOne brand of IBM Commerce.  
 
Dr. Zarifoglu earned his Ph.D. in Operations Research and Industrial Engineering from University of Texas at Austin. He holds B.S. and M.S. degrees in Industrial Engineering from Bilkent University, Turkey.  
 
Prior to IBM, he worked for Gravitant, University of Texas at Austin/ISMI, and AMD. He has been a frontier in developing SaaS applications, Cloud Transformation efforts and building Optimization and Analytics frameworks for Cloud Computing. He holds a patent in Cloud Analytics. He also has a well established research record in planning and scheduling in semiconductor manufacturing. His work is being published in IEEE and has been presented in IERC and INFORMS.
